remarks: Two operators with the same domain are equal iff their values at each point in the domain are equal.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 7-Jun-2010.)
statement:
eqfnov2 $p |- ( ( F Fn ( A X. B ) /\ G Fn ( A X. B ) ) -> ( F = G <-> A. x e. A A. y e. B ( x F y ) = ( x G y ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
